[ MUSIC ] [ BLANK _ AUDIO ] When news broke Tuesday that Karlie Kloss and Josh Kushner are now engaged after six years together, it delighted her fans. But naturally, the news has caused some to wonder more about the relatively private man at its center. While Kloss's projects and ambitions are firmly in the spotlight, Kushner has grown his own career more covertly. He has co - founded multiple companies, including Oscar Health, which has paid off for him â€” literally.
